dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 33 ATS: Commemorating the 150th anniversary of Emporia State University.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran (for himself and Mr. Roberts) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Commemorating the 150th anniversary of Emporia State University.

whereas.text: Whereas, in 1863, the State of Kansas founded the Kansas State Normal School to provide opportunities for higher education in the fields of teaching, mechanic arts, agriculture, and various other arts and sciences;
Whereas Emporia State University is the alma mater of more than 75,000 proud alumni; and
Whereas the quality of Emporia State University as an institution of higher learning is a reflection of the extraordinary caliber of its educational professionals and students: Now, therefore, be it

section.text: That the Senate recognizes and extends its congratulations to the educational professionals, students, and alumni of Emporia State University for 150 years of excellence in higher education.
